short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find live music events on GigsGuide automatically when you search for accommodation on Booking.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GigsGuide is the ultimate travel planning tool for music lovers.

Live music and travel are among the best things in life. GigsGuide was born with a simple goal: give serendipity a gentle push, and help music lovers discover new artists wherever they go and get closer to the local music scene of their travel destinations.

The GigsGuide extension for Chrome now makes it even easier to turn every trip into an amazing musical adventure!

Every time you search for a hotel on Booking.com, you automatically also get a list of live music events taking place at your destination around your travel dates. 

GigsGuide maintains an extensive database of over 60.000 live music events all over Europe, North America and ANZ. We provide key information about the performers and links to the official ticket outlets, so you can stop wasting hours googling around, and find the concerts that best match your taste.

If you already have a GigsGuide account (or get one today... it's free ;)) you can save the events you are most interested in so you can easily access them whenever you want or share them with your friends. 

GigsGuide is a free service and is not endorsed by Booking.com. The extension adds our affiliate code to your search on Booking.com so you can help us keep the service up and running while still enjoying your Genius deals and the best prices on Booking.com.
